title: Enhanced Simulation Education (SEE) Course for Neurosurgical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic neurosurgical anatomy and experience with surgical tool usage
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training for in-house experts at medical device companies, utilizing high-fidelity VR simulations replicating real surgical environments

learning_goals: Participants can perform basic incision and suturing techniques in neurosurgical simulations with 90% accuracy
Participants achieve a success rate of over 70% in complex clinical scenarios (e.g., hemorrhage management)
Participants write reports demonstrating clinical judgment and decision-making skills in project-based assessments after simulation training
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
